research_question: What are the readout error rates on q[2,4]? Is there cross-talk between them? ZNE showed gate noise is NOT the dominant error source -- readout errors likely dominate the ~7 kcal/mol hardware error in VQE.
purpose: Calibrate per-qubit confusion matrices for readout error mitigation (REM). These matrices will be used to correct VQE measurement distributions, potentially recovering chemical accuracy.
